nodes.text: The Dibrook Space Station was a New Republic space station orbiting the planet Dibrook. At the time of the Yuuzhan Vong War, Commander Bylsma and his underling Ogden were in charge of the station and its starfighter complement. During the war, many refugees were placed on the station until permanent accommodations could be found for them.

The station came under attack, and was damaged, during the Battle of Dibrook. The arrival of the Heart of Artorias helped defeat the Yuuzhan Vong attackers. Shortly after the battle, troops were sent to the planet's surface with the Heart of Artorias to find refugees taken by the Yuuzhan Vong during the battle.
